it.polimi.rtag
Class GroupCommunicationManager

java.lang.Object
  it.polimi.rtag.GroupCommunicationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
GroupDiscoveredNotificationListener, polimi.reds.broker.overlay.NeighborhoodChangeListener
public class GroupCommunicationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements polimi.reds.broker.overlay.NeighborhoodChangeListener, GroupDiscoveredNotificationListener

Handles the communication of a group and also keep the group descriptor updated.

Author:
Panteha Saeedi (saeedi@elet.polimi.it).
See Also:
NeighborhoodChangeListener, PacketListener}

notifyNeighborAdded

public void notifyNeighborAdded(polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor addedNode,
                                java.io.Serializable reconfigurationInfo)
Notify this group manager that a new node has been discovered. If the current node is a follower then nothing has to be done.

If the node is a leader then it depends. If the new discovered node is already a group member (which can happen in case of internal delay) nothing is done. Otherwise if the new node is not a member of the group the leader will send it a MessageSubjects.GROUP_DISCOVERED_NOTIFICATION.

Specified by:
notifyNeighborAdded in interface polimi.reds.broker.overlay.NeighborhoodChangeListener
See Also:
NeighborhoodChangeListener.notifyNeighborAdded(polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor, java.io.Serializable)

notifyNeighborDead

                               java.io.Serializable reconfigurationInfo)
Specified by:
notifyNeighborDead in interface polimi.reds.broker.overlay.NeighborhoodChangeListener

notifyNeighborRemoved

public void notifyNeighborRemoved(polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor removedNode)
Notify this group manager that a new node has been removed. If the current node is not a follower of this group, then ignore the message.

If the removed node is not a leader, we remove the node from the descriptor. If the current node is a leader it sends the updated group descriptor.

If the removed node was the leader, a new leader is required to be selected.

Specified by:
notifyNeighborRemoved in interface polimi.reds.broker.overlay.NeighborhoodChangeListener
See Also:
NeighborhoodChangeListener.notifyNeighborRemoved(polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor)

handleMessageGroupCreatedNotification

public void handleMessageGroupCreatedNotification(polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor sender,
                                                  GroupDescriptor packet)
When a node creates a new group the created group descriptor is spread over the network. Group leaders can use this information to merge similar groups.

If the group somehow match with the tuple description of this group then the new group should become a child of this.

See Also:
MessageSubjects#GROUP_CREATED_NOTIFICATION}, GroupLeaderCommand#MERGE_GROUPS}

handleGroupDiscovered

public void handleGroupDiscovered(polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor sender,
                                  GroupDescriptor remoteGroupDescriptor)
When a group leader receives a group discovered message and the current node is the leader then the manager can either merge the other group or join it as a member.
